website_summaries.verdict: A great size to split the difference between the depth shorter children need and the fun older kids want.
pros: 3-ply reinforced material with polyester mesh-core encased in 2 layers of laminated PVC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, set up was a breeze,did it by myself. Instructions could be better, watching a video beforehand helped a lot. Pool seems very sturdy, for the price it should come with a ladder, as it is I had to buy one. Adults can get in and out okay but kids have to be hoisted. Pump is okay so far,had minor leak that I fixed with some rubber bands and tightening the screws. No major swimming as it is small but overall we love it. Perfect for toddlers and older kids too.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: A nice little pool.
customer_reviews.text: Every season we bought a quick set soft pool. By the end of the season they were pretty beat up and patched. This year we upgraded to this pool. +easy set up +sturdy +the rigid frame keeps the water in. The soft sided pools had to be refilled as they lost a lot of water to splashing and kids leaning on the sides. +seems a bit larger because the walls go straight up rather than angle in. +looks nice -Filter is worthless. You will need to upgrade. -doesn't come with cover or ladder -300 bucks. If it lasts at least 3 seasons that will be ok. If not.....
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Leyda

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the concrete salab we have. I like That it’s deeper than other rectangular pools. Solid to come with a ladder but I had One from a previous bigger pool. Not sure about the pump yet other reviews said it wasn’t that good but haven’t turned it on yet
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Pump is trash
customer_reviews.text: Pool is great pump is trash! I honestly would give it 10 out of 10 if If came with the accurate pump for the pool size... my dad has a pool and looked at the pump it came with told me that this should be a pump for a large fish tank?! Are you serious ??? Anyways go upgrade to the intex .75 horsepower it’ll keep your pool crystal clear. Also I went ahead and also bought aqua bug pool vacuum and so far so good. Total investment with pool upgraded pump and vacuum about 1k. Worth it to keep the kids busy all day lol!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Quick 3 day delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 14x8x4 and received a 18x9x4, luckily I had just enough room. Assembly instructions are a joke. Otherwise I plan on getting plenty of use out of this pool. Delivery was four days sooner than the earliest expected delivery day.
customer_reviews.author: Flatlander

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The kids are thrilled with the size. Setting it up was quite simple and not too time consuming. We skim the pool daily, so the pump has been great for us. However, if you are unable to skim frequently, It’s possible a larger pump may be needed.
customer_reviews.author: Skyla

customer_reviews.title: Great pool, but the pump is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this pool is awesome. Assembly took an hour and was pretty easy. But the pump is 100% trash. They would be better to just take 50$ off the price and not even include it sense you will be buying another one anyway. Great size for kids learning how to swim, yet big enough for the whole family to actually swim.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is a good pool for the price but I wish it came with a better pump. No idea what other pump will fit so I can upgrade it.. otherwise all good
customer_reviews.author: Edina

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: This pool is great!! It’s excellent if you’re looking for a place to just take a dip and cool off. We’ve had the pool set up and running for a few days and so far we have no complaints. Customer service is AMAZING and was very prompt taking care of our pool that initially arrived damaged (just a fluke manufacturing issue).. my problem was resolved within 24 hours! This pool is very easy to assemble once you get a vibe for the instructions. I’m 5’ tall 118 lbs and was able to haul the package into our back yard and assemble it myself in less than 90 minutes. Definitely recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Travis Winstead

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not the best.
customer_reviews.text: The assembly went okay, but the ibstructions were not clear. They have a manual for 6 or 7 pools all in a single document. The pump GFCI will no longer reset after running for 3 hours. This is kinda rediculous, i can't get the pump to turn back on.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Chiappone

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pool is perfect for us to use this summer to stay cool while staycationing! It was easy to put up and easy to maintain. We did upgrade to a sand filter as suggested by many. Be sure to put wood or pavers under each support or the sides will sink due to water splashing out of the pool. Thankful to find this pool for a decent price here on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pump is absolute junk
customer_reviews.text: The pump that comes with this is absolute junk, undersized and leaks constantly. I've contacted the seller but they only offer a 30 day return/refund for this. The pump has been used for less than 30 days. They are selling a product they know to have a junk pump according to everyones feedback on this item. They aren't doing anything about it. plus they are now selling for over $2000 more than I paid for it. Unacceptable!!!
customer_reviews.author: M.Hagarman

customer_reviews.title: Supplied pump is useless
customer_reviews.text: Pool is the perfect size, great for my 5 and 3 years olds. The problem lies with the ad was very misleading it is for the next size up pool. I did not receive a ladder and cover for the pool. After talking to customer service realized those items don’t come with with the pool. Now I need to spend more money for a ladder. Should of went with Intex.
customer_reviews.author: bradley miller

customer_reviews.title: This pool is way over rated!
customer_reviews.text: This pool i bought for summer or 2020 was suppose to NOT RUST! I have rust already on some of the poles! Of course I cannot whip outside and take this pool down and return like you can a shirt! I am very upset that it didn't even barely make it thru a summer before rusting and will never purchase this brand again. The liner is not sewed even ...it has flaps on the bottom of the side walls and it catches every little bug or debris and have to get in there and stir it out all the time. Not happy AT ALL!!
customer_reviews.author: sky111

customer_reviews.title: Pump is junk
customer_reviews.text: We ordered our pool and received it within 3 weeks which was fantastic. It was easy to set up. The pump and filter system is too small for a pool this size and is inefficient. We went out today to turn on the pump and NOTHING. So now we are stuck with an assembled pool and no pump. We have used the pool for maybe 4 weeks now. The reviews of the pump are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Melody C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for pool in small area!!
customer_reviews.text: I Loved the size it allowed me to have an area to cool down in the backyard without being overpowering We ran the small pump 24/7 and it kept it pretty clean. We did not have a vacuum for small amount of sand that was on bottom of pool. We have purchased a bigger vacuum for next year and hope to be able to attach a vacuum to it. Anyone have any ideas or has anyone had any luck with getting a vacuum for the pool?
customer_reviews.author: Gitbit

customer_reviews.title: Great pool!
customer_reviews.text: This year we have enjoyed our Bestway Power Steel pool. Looking forward to using it again next summer! Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pump last 30 days!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am truly disgusted! We spend almost $800.00 on this...waited for weeks before they could ship it. Then 30 days after we get it set up, the pump stops. We have tried to upload images as requested via BESTWAY website to activate a claim, and the site would not upload after waiting an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny's Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: This pool is great. my 7y can swim, the 5y still learning so the height is perfect to where it's not too deep that the young one is scared and deep enough that the older one can "swim" in it. The shape is what I like most...a circular pool in my opinion takes up unnecessary space. I do, as others have said, highly recommend getting a bigger pump...I got the intex 1000g one and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Simala

customer_reviews.title: Nice. But to small.
customer_reviews.text: This pool is very well built. Very sturdy when filled up. Set up is fast and easy. The only thing I didn't like was the pool is tiny! It's okay for small children. About the age of 8 and under. Not adequate for teens or adults.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great pool....filter not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. It was easy to set up. Seems to be so much better than the inflated ring pools. If you’re thinking about getting this pool you’ll probably love it but plan on buying a better pump/filter. I waited to see for myself but ordered a better filter as soon as I finished setting up the pool
customer_reviews.author: bdh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pool
customer_reviews.text: I was fortunate to get this pool under 800, it is a great pool, the filter pump could be better but it does the trick, also since it gets hot here in Texas the water is always nice and warm by the time we go in in the late afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Anna Garibay

customer_reviews.title: An improvement over the PVC framed units
customer_reviews.text: We like the metal tube frame construction. We dislike the under powered pool pump that does little to keep the pool clean, the rickety ladder, and the four cheap pump hoses that burst after only six weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Carl A. Roedell

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool for the money
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids love to play in it deep and big enough to swim in
customer_reviews.author: Bob F.

customer_reviews.title: pump is  worthless
customer_reviews.text: pump is worthless... i dont think i would buy again... buyers remorse!!! should have bought the one at costco
customer_reviews.author: b.l.mis

customer_reviews.title: Summer Fun
customer_reviews.text: This pool is great. The only thing I didn't like is that if you use the two intakes and have a skimmer attached the pump that comes with it is not strong enough for the skimmer. I plugged one of the intake holes and it works great with my skimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality pool for the money
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else has reviewed. I think the pump needs to be bigger for this size pool. We haven’t used the pool this first year as much do to the mild summer weather this year. So the pump is doing ok with minimal use. But not sure if it’s used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: Nice size pool. However the cover doesn’t fit and no liner for the ground. Have to buy a larger pool cover... more money.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Marie White

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase had I known
customer_reviews.text: Pool kit did Not come with a ground cover that was described in the item description. Sturdiness of pool assembly on level concrete only fair. I couldn't find anywhere to contact seller regarding issues except to return item which is more is far from convenient. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Just put it up and filling it
customer_reviews.text: We just put it up and we are filling it. It was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Heart

customer_reviews.title: Affordable escape
customer_reviews.text: I set up this pool in the backyard as an escape during the pandemic. My family loves it!! Takes a lot of maintenance though.
customer_reviews.author: elsa hartwick

customer_reviews.title: The best pool I ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can fit 9 to 10 people in the pool. I had to buy another pump with filter because the one it came with was not strong enough. But over all I love the pool. I recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble that my wife and kids did it. Looks very sturdy and nice.
customer_reviews.author: ALAIN RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Best COVID-19 season purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our backyard. It was a great addition as we aren’t able to go anywhere during this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Nice pool for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Good size for a few people. Great for kids. Pump undersized, but that appears to be the theme for all above ground pools
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sisk Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Better than expected. Wasn’t crazy about the ladder (no platform at top for small children to step on) so we use a different one that also has a safety lock.
customer_reviews.author: for kids

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase we made this SUMMER🥵😊
customer_reviews.text: We literally used this pool every days this summer. It was the perfect size for our yard and family size. Highly recommend this pool.
customer_reviews.author: LAGE

customer_reviews.title: Loud pump and missing pump hoses
customer_reviews.text: The pool came with wrong hoses for pump but bought some that with a little work was able to make work. The pump is very very loud... Otherwise pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January it’s now time to put up the pool and it’s the wrong size, now in stuck with it it was never opened
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Excelente pool.
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed this pool over the summer. Great investment for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy for kids
customer_reviews.text: This pool is not sturdy. Seller now wants to to give back only 50 percent of the sales price. I am taking legal action against this company if they do not full refund me my money.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Pool
customer_reviews.text: The pool a nice size, the pump isn't that strong, other than that kids love the pool.
customer_reviews.author: sarin sieng

customer_reviews.title: a cool pool to have it arrived safe and fast
customer_reviews.text: I liked think it is a wonderful pool my pool cover didn't fit my pool but bestway replaced and now my pool is amazing. I think the ladder should be taller
customer_reviews.author: vincenta seymour

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. The pump only lasted 2 months and Bestway will not reply to warranty emails. Recommend picking a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great little pool perfect for small kids learning to swim.
customer_reviews.author: mario n. alpizar

customer_reviews.title: Easy as 123
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, and has been easy to up keep all summer. All my children love it.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Gofourth

customer_reviews.title: Pump problem!!
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to turn off the pump to change the filter if u can find the filters!!!
customer_reviews.author: lisa amshoff

customer_reviews.title: Small fan broke inside of pump
customer_reviews.text: The pool itself is ok ,but the fan brakes apart inside pump motor to push the water. Cant find one anywhere. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Huntington

customer_reviews.title: great size and value
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this pool! It fits 5 adults and 2 children comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Verduzco

customer_reviews.title: This was a very nice pool but the description was not accurate
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice pool but the description was not accurate. In saying that, the companion refunded my money in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: Great pool, study, awful filter.
customer_reviews.text: Great small pool, perfect size to sit on the bottom and still have head out of the water (5'10"human height). Filter is garbage, I got the $75 one on Amazon and it's great. This is the perfect size for one person to be able to set up.
customer_reviews.author: JRL

product_meta.title: Bestway 16ft x 10ft x 42in Power Steel Above Ground Swimming Pool Set with Pump
feature_bullets: Easy-to-assemble oval-shaped swimming pool adds a fun attraction to your backyard
Side walls and the wall band are built of Tritech material to resist wear and stand up to all weather conditions
Tritech material encases a layer of high-quality polyester mesh between two layers of strong PVC
Seal & Lock System provides a secure pipe connection to guarantee the frame holds up to summer fun
Garden hose adapter connects to the drain plug for stress-free draining to any location

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars141 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
